2025-07-05.message: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God.

2025-07-06.message: Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, present your requests to God.

2025-07-07.message: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. Do not let your hearts be troubled.

2025-07-08.message: All things work together for good to them that love God.

2025-07-09.message: The Lord is your Shepherd, you shall not want. Trust His leading today.

2025-07-10.message: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.

2025-07-11.message: Seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness, and all these things will be added to you.
